name: auto-hide-panels
description: Automatically hides the Side Bar, Panel, and Secondary Side Bar when the editor is focused, with granular control over each component.

commands.title: Auto Hide Panels: Toggle Auto Hide Panel
Auto Hide Panels: Toggle Auto Hide Sidebar
Auto Hide Panels: Toggle Auto Hide Secondary Sidebar

autoHidePanels.enabled.description: Master toggle to enable/disable the extension.

autoHidePanels.autoHidePanel.description: Automatically hide the Panel (bottom panel with terminal, output, etc.) when the editor is focused.

autoHidePanels.autoHideSidebar.description: Automatically hide the primary Sidebar when the editor is focused.

autoHidePanels.autoHideSecondarySidebar.description: Automatically hide the Secondary Sidebar (auxiliary bar) when the editor is focused.

scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run ensure-vsce && vsce package
